text: Casket of Eternal Winters contains icy winds which can freeze ground from here to horizon turning even hottest of deserts into wintery plane.(Cost 25 [[img:belisarian_eternal_ice]][[/img]])
Gate of Avalon is portal to land of dreams, knights and dragons. You can always find friends who are willing to help there .(Cost 25 [[img:belisarian_eternal_ice]][[/img]])
Master mages of Icy Tower can perform ritual to fire remote freezing beam and freeze anyone in area of your choosing.(Cost 25 [[img:belisarian_eternal_ice]][[/img]])
